node.title: How a video of Ahmaud Arbery's death captured the world's attention and led to three murder convictions
node.alt: A woman holds a sign saying "Justice for Ahmaud"
node.description: Greg McMichael, his son Travis McMichael and neighbour William "Roddie" Bryan were not charged until a video of the incident emerged, two months after Ahmaud Arbery's murder in 2020.Â
node.content:
["Ahmaud Arbery was jogging down a street in southern Georgia unarmed\u00a0in February 2020 when he was pursued\u00a0by three men\u00a0and killed with a shotgun.\u00a0", "Nearly two years later, a\u00a0mostly white jury has now convicted the\u00a0men with the 25-year-old's\u00a0murder.\u00a0", "However, Greg McMichael, his son Travis McMichael and neighbour William \"Roddie\" Bryan were not even charged until a video of the incident emerged, two months after the incident.\u00a0", "So who was Mr Arbery and what's the significance of the case in the United States's ongoing national reckoning with racial injustice?\u00a0", "
'Maud' had brushes with the law but\u00a0was known for his smile
", "Ahmaud Marquez Arbery was a lifelong resident of the south Georgia city of Brunswick.\u00a0", "He was known to his friends\u00a0as \"Maud\" or \"Quez\" and had dreams to become a footballer in the National Football League.", "", "
Ahmaud\u00a0Arbery\u00a0was killed by three men in February 2020.(Reuters: Octavio Jones)
", "In a sign of respect, his coach at Brunswick High School, where Mr Arbery graduated in 2012, retired the star player's football jersey, number\u00a021, at a ceremony last year.", "Mr Arbery worked long hours at a truck washing company and at his father's landscaping business, and was known for his big smile.", "He was an avid weightlifter and often sang freestyle rap.\u00a0", "But he had some brushes with the law, including for bringing a pistol on school grounds during a basketball game in 2013.", "He was also\u00a0arrested for attempted shoplifting at a local Walmart store \u2014 incidents his family said he had put behind him.", "
Who was convicted over Arbery's\u00a0murder?
", "Greg McMichael, his son Travis McMichael and neighbour William \"Roddie\" Bryan were each convicted of murdering Mr Arbery.", "The court heard the McMichaels grabbed a shotgun and\u00a0jumped in a pick-up truck to pursue Mr Arbery after seeing him\u00a0running in their Brunswick neighbourhood\u00a0on\u00a0February 23, 2020.\u00a0", "", "
Greg McMichael (left), Travis McMichael (middle)\u00a0and William Bryan (right) were convicted of murder.(Reuters)
", "Bryan joined the pursuit and\u00a0recorded a mobile phone video of Travis McMichael fatally shooting Mr Arbery.", "Travis McMichael was convicted of all\u00a0charges and\u00a0Greg McMichael was convicted of all charges except malice murder.", "Bryan was convicted of two counts of felony murder, one count of aggravated assault, one count of false imprisonment and one count of criminal attempt to commit a felony.", "
Why did it take so long for his killers to\u00a0be charged?
", "The McMichaels weren't\u00a0arrested until May 7 after the Georgia Bureau of Investigation (GBI) took over the shooting investigation from Glynn County police.", "Just before local authorities made arrests,\u00a0a radio station in Brunswick\u00a0released a video of Mr Arbery's shooting and posted it online.", "", "
William \"Roddie\" Bryan filmed a video of Ahmaud Arbery's murder.(Reuters:\u00a0Stephen B\u00a0Morton/Pool)
", "Republican Governor\u00a0Brian Kemp called the video \"absolutely horrific\"\u00a0and urged the GBI\u00a0to get involved.", "Its agents rapidly arrested both McMichaels and Bryan.", "Bryan, who joined the McMichaels in the chase, filmed the pursuit and shooting\u00a0on his phone.\u00a0", "It shows\u00a0Mr Arbery run around the truck to the right before he cuts back in front of it. Then a gunshot can be heard, followed by a second shot.", "Mr Arbery was seen punching a man holding what appeared to be a shotgun, who then fires\u00a0a third shot point-blank.\u00a0", "Mr Arbery staggered\u00a0and fell\u00a0face down in the street.", "After the video was leaked, protesters took to the streets and demanded the two district attorneys\u00a0working on the case \u2014 Jackie Johnson and George Barnhill \u2014 be removed\u00a0for dragging their feet in arresting the McMichaels.", "Mr Barnhill\u00a0had provided police with a written opinion that no arrests should be made in connection with the February 23 shooting.", "Many activists saw Mr Arbery's death as the latest US case of white perpetrators killing a black man and going unpunished.", "
What happened at the trial?
", "", "
The prosecutor said\u00a0there was no evidence Ahmaud Arbery committed crimes in the neighbourhood.(AP: Octavio Jones)
", "The McMichaels and Bryan all pleaded not guilty to\u00a0murdering Mr Arbery.\u00a0", "Defence lawyers said\u00a0the McMichaels were attempting a citizen's arrest when they pursued\u00a0Mr Arbery\u00a0as a suspected burglar after he was seen running from a nearby home under construction.", "Travis McMichael testified that he shot Mr Arbery in self-defence, saying the man\u00a0attacked him with his fists while running past the idling truck where he stood with his shotgun.", "Prosecutors said there was no evidence Mr Arbery had committed crimes in their neighbourhood.", "The men face minimum sentences of life in prison. It is up to the judge to decide whether that comes with or without the possibility of parole.", "President Joe Biden said the convictions showed that America's criminal justice system is \"doing its job,\"\u00a0though the killing was \"a devastating reminder of how far we have to go in the fight for racial justice in this country\".", "\"Instead, we must recommit ourselves to building a future of unity and shared strength, where no-one fears violence because of the colour of their skin,\"\u00a0Mr Biden said in a statement.", "
So, what happens now?
", "Legal experts in the US said it was likely the trio would appeal against the conviction, possibly on the basis of exclusion of certain evidence from the trial.", "Defence lawyers\u00a0had sought to introduce evidence of Mr Arbery's criminal record, records on his mental health and the fact that he was on probation.", "", "
The three men will also face federal charges.\u00a0(AP: Bobby Haven/The Brunswick News )
", "They also wanted to have a use-of-force expert testify. But the judge ruled against admitting any of that evidence.", "However, the\u00a0McMichaels and Bryan still face federal charges.", "A few months before the trio stood trial on murder charged in Georgia, a US grand jury indicted them on hate crime charges in an entirely separate case.", "The three men are charged with interference of civil rights and attempted kidnapping.", "The father and son were also charged with using, carrying and brandishing a firearm during a crime of violence.\u00a0", "The federal indictment says the men targeted Mr Arbery because he was black.", "ABC/wires"]
